talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey! This isn't a place for junk! Don't you
even think about throwing trash in!

<sp:0:2:2:5000>These waters are connected to the <clr:0000>wells on the
surface<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>They are absolutely not a garbage dump.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0003:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0b00>Rude!<sp:5:1:0> I am not throwing trash away!


These are letters! Letters to the voe of my dreams!
They are very, very important!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
